text: Roy Oliver Disney (; June 24, 1893 - December 20, 1971) was an American businessman. He was the co-founder of The Walt Disney Company. He was the older brother of Walt Disney and the father of Roy E. Disney. ==References== Category:1893 births Category:1971 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Disney people Category:American chief executives Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
title: Roy O. Disney
